title: Crop damage: Researchers advance effort to manage parasitic roundworms

title_detail.value: Crop damage: Researchers advance effort to manage parasitic roundworms

summary: Roundworms that feed on plants cause approximately $100 billion in annual global crop damage. Now researchers have made a patent-pending discovery that certain enzymes in roundworms, called nematodes, behave differently than the same enzymes in humans, with amino acids potentially playing a key role.
